casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dane LOCKLEAR, Jr. No. 578A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 14, 2005. William P. Hart, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*267The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of October 2005 by Defendant to Extend Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 18th day of November 2005 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel. By order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of October 2005."
